rukus.text: 37|1|seuseulo yeoljieo seon geudeullo hayeo maengsehago
37|2|saagham-eul jeojihaneun geudeullo hayeo maengsehago
37|3|hananim-ui malsseum-eul yeom-wonhaneun geudeullo hayeo maengsehanani
37|4|sillo neohuiui hananim-eun heullo gyesinila
37|5|geubun-eun haneulgwa daejiui junim-isimyeo geu saie issneun manmulgwa dongseo ui junim-isila
37|6|hananimkkeseo jisang-ui haneul-eul byeol deullo aleumdabge jangsighayeossnani
37|7|geoyeoghaneun modeun agmalobuteo bo hohagi wihaeseola
37|8|geulihayeo geudeul-eun cheonsadeul-ui hoeuileul yeosdeul-eul su eobsgo sabang-eseo hwayeom-ui dol-eul maj-eumyeo
37|9|jjochgyeona yeong-wonhan beol-eul bad-eulila
37|10|mollae mueos-inga humchyeoganeun ja issdamyeon chisosneun hwayeom-ui bulgil-i geu leul chujeoghalila
37|11|geudeul-ege mul-eobola geudeul-i mandeun geos-i hananim-i changjohan geosgwa eoneu geos-i ganghanyo hananim-eun geudeul eul jinheulg-eulo changjohayeossnola
37|12|geudaeneun nollago gamtanhana geu deul-eun biusgo issnola
37|13|geudeul-eun hungyeleul bad-euna juui haji anihamyeo
37|14|geudeul-eun yejeung-eul jikyeobona jo longhamyeo
37|15|igeos-eun bunmyeonghan masul-e bulgwa hadago hadeola
37|16|uliga jug-eo heulg-gwa ppyeoga doen hu dasi buhwaldoendaneun mal-inyo
37|17|uliui jinagan seonjodeuldo geu leohge doendan mal-inyo
37|18|illeogalodoe geuleohaneola geuttaeneohuineun neohuiui saagham-eulo inhayeo bichamhage doelila
37|19|geuttae han soliga ullyeo peojilini bola geuttae geudeul-eun seolo boge doemae
37|20|geudeul-eun malhalila seulpeudoda igeos-i simpan-ui nal-iguna
37|21|igeos-i balo neohuiga geoyeoghaess deon simpan-ui nal-ila
